mapper.select: select o.orderId oid,send, sphone,semail, sprovince,scity,receive,rphone,remail remail, rprovince,rcity,`time`, `check`,c.NameZh,og.num,g.name gname,g.goodID gid , expiry, temperature, `type`, mass, length, width, height, unit from client c,`order` o,good g,`order_good` og where c.companyCode = o.client and o.orderId = og.orderID and og.goodID = g.goodID

select o.orderId oid,send, sphone,semail, sprovince,scity,receive,rphone,remail remail, rprovince,rcity,`time`, `check`,c.NameZh,og.num,g.name gname,g.goodID gid, expiry, temperature, `type`, mass, length, width, height, unit from client c,`order` o,good g,`order_good` og where c.companyCode = o.client and o.orderId = og.orderID and og.goodID = g.goodID and `check` = '提交';

select o.orderId oid,send, sphone,semail, sprovince,scity,receive,rphone,remail remail, rprovince,rcity,`time`, `check`,c.NameZh,og.num,g.name gname,g.goodID gid, expiry, temperature, `type`, mass, length, width, height, unit from client c,`order` o,good g,`order_good` og where c.companyCode = o.client and o.orderId = og.orderID and og.goodID = g.goodID and `check` = '审核';

select o.orderId oid,send, sphone,semail, sprovince,scity,receive,rphone,remail remail, rprovince,rcity,`time`, `check`,c.NameZh,og.num,g.name gname,g.goodID gid, expiry, temperature, `type`, mass, length, width, height, unit from client c,`order` o,good g,`order_good` og where c.companyCode = o.client and o.orderId = og.orderID and og.goodID = g.goodID and `check` = '未通过';
